name: subtranslate-workspace
description: SubTranslate 智能视频字幕翻译系统工作区

scripts.dev: cd frontend/shared && pnpm build && cd ../.. && cd frontend && pnpm --filter electron-app dev
scripts.dev:win: cd frontend/shared && pnpm build && cd ../.. && cd frontend && powershell -Command "$OutputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8; chcp 65001 | Out-Null; pnpm --filter electron-app dev:win"
scripts.build: cd frontend/shared && pnpm build && cd ../.. && cd frontend && pnpm --filter electron-app build
